# é…ç½® PublishOverSSH

    1. éœ€è¦å®‰è£… PublishOverSSH çš„æ’ä»¶
    1. å…¨å±€é…ç½® PublishOverSSH ï¼š Manage Jenkins -> Configure System -> PublishOverSSh
    • é«˜çº§ä¸­é…ç½® ssh çš„ç™»å½•å¯†ç 
    1. é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ï¼šæ³¨æ„ Exec Commandæ˜¯ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è„šæœ¬é‡Œä¹Ÿè¦å†™ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„
    1. start.sh è„šæœ¬å‚è€ƒ
#!/bin/bash
# Author: power by mengqizhang
# About: https://github.com/DemoMeng
source ~/.bash_profile
source /etc/profile
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/java/
APP_NAME=/home/mqz/qingwang-module/qingwang-user/user-web-0.0.1.jar
FILE_NAME=user-web-0.0.1.jar
usage() {
    echo "è„šæœ¬ç”¨æ³•: sh startup.sh [start|stop|restart|status|delete]"
    exit 1
}

is_exist(){
  pid=`ps -ef|grep $FILE_NAME|grep -v grep|awk '{print $2}'`
  #å¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨è¿”å›1ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨è¿”å›0
  if [ -z "${pid}" ]; then
   return 1
  else
    return 0
  fi
}

start(){
  is_exist
  if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "${APP_NAME} is already running. pid=${pid}"
  else
   echo "ç¨‹åºå³å°†å¯åŠ¨"
   nohup /usr/local/jdk1.8.0_11/bin/java -jar ${APP_NAME} > /home/mqz/qingwang-module/qingwang-user/console.out 2>&1 &
  fi
}
stop(){
  is_exist
  if [ $? -eq "0" ]; then
    kill -9 $pid
  else
    echo "${APP_NAME} is not running"
  fi
}

status(){
  is_exist
  if [ $? -eq "0" ]; then
    echo "${APP_NAME} is running. Pid is ${pid}"
  else
    echo "${APP_NAME} is NOT running."
  fi
}

restart(){
  stop
  echo "----------ç¨‹åºå·²ç»åœæ­¢ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨é‡å¯----------"
  sleep 3
  start
}

case "$1" in
  "start")
    start
    ;;
  "stop")
    stop
    ;;
  "status")
    status
    ;;
  "restart")
    restart
    ;;
  "delete")
    deleted
    ;;
  *)
    usage
    ;;
esac
